description:
it work on wubuntu after the little correction in the file disposition.py 
thanks

It's a pretty fun app but it didn't work on (k)ubuntu 23.10+. In order to fix it, you must modify the file `dispositions.py`. It is usually installed in the python3/dist-packages/gvbmod folder inside `/usr/lib`. Change line 56, so that the indices of the slice are explicitly integers, like so:

```
calculated = calculated[int(fase):int(lenght+fase)]
```
summary: Had to modify, was broken at first

description: Nice app, though won't run on 18.04. Lastly used it on 16.04 LTS.
summary: Nice app for science and math nuts!

description: Sounded like a super cool program to play with but it doesn't look like it works on 20.10 Ubuntu Studio. Hopefully it's an easy fix!
